desc.cn: Kubeval 是用于验证 Kubernetes YAML 或 JSON 配置文件的工具
desc.en: kubeval is a tool for validating a Kubernetes YAML or JSON configuration file

linux/wget.cmd:
wget https://github.com/instrumenta/kubeval/releases/latest/download/kubeval-linux-amd64.tar.gz
&& tar xf kubeval-linux-amd64.tar.gz \
&& sudo cp kubeval /usr/local/bin

darwin/wget.cmd:
wget https://github.com/instrumenta/kubeval/releases/latest/download/kubeval-darwin-amd64.tar.gz \
&& tar xf kubeval-darwin-amd64.tar.gz \
&& sudo cp kubeval /usr/local/bin

/berw.cmd:
brew tap instrumenta/instrumenta \
&& brew install c

(win|wsl2)/scoop.cmd:
x scoop bucket add instrumenta https://github.com/instrumenta/scoop-instrumenta \
&& x scoop install kubeval
